overview: Eduardo is a prosperous publicist from Rio de Janeiro, married to Sandra, but feeling sexually impotent, he seeks out a famous psychoanalyst. In an attempt to discover the source of the problem, they go to Eduardo's country house and find his wife's cousin, one of his lovers. A problem arises and Eduardo returns to town, but a storm prevents him from traveling and he returns home, surprising the doctor with his wife in bed.
title: Depravação
